name: Deck Tape
description:
You and your older brother picked up an old card game and don't know any of the rules. You don't take turns,  draw cards as fast as you can, and use tape to remove stats you don't like.

- Click the deck to draw cards

- Click bananas to collect them, spend bananas to play cards

- Click the tape to start taping, then click whatever you want to remove on any card

- Have over 20 damage on the board to win

- Press R to restart the game

Credits:

- Code: TopBanana, PoignantBanana(Sperges)

- 2D Art: TopBanana

- 3D Art: PoignantBanana
